column1: Uchi////- Lime Ash Sorbet. Their best dessert
column2: imo. We asked our incredible server (wish I could remember his name! Michael
column4: and he was kind enough to go the kitchen
column5: get some dehydrated lime and a bit of finished ash
column6: and bring it out to give us a show-and-tell demonstration and tasting! How cool is that? I know everyone raves about the fried milk
column8: but the lime ash sorbet is the oft overlooked green-headed step-dessert. Try it.
